entry.summary: ...THREAT OF URBAN AND RIVER RIVER FLOODING THROUGH EARLY NEXT WEEK ACROSS WESTERN WASHINGTON... A series of storm systems will bring moderate to heavy precipitation and a rapid warm-up through the weekend into next week. The first round of moderate to heavy rainfall will occur today with snow levels rising to 6000 to 7000 feet. Additional enhancement of runoff
